articles.author: Emma Roth
articles.title: Apple is reportedly working on a device with a 20-inch folding display
articles.description: Apple tracker Mark Gurman says Apple is working on a foldable device with a 20-inch display that doubles as an iPad and MacBook.
articles.content:
Its still years away
Illustration by Alex Castro / The Verge
Apple may be working on a device with a 20-inch foldable display, which Apple tracker Mark Gurman describes as an iPad / MacBook hybrid … [+1151 chars]

articles.author: Igor Bonifacic
articles.title: The free trial of Apple Music was quietly reduced to a single month
articles.description: Since its debut in 2015, Apple Music has offered one of the more generous free trial periods in the streaming industry. As a first-time subscriber, you could use the platform to listen to music for free for up to three months before the company asked you to s…
